title: Mirror of Germany. No. 240 = Deutschland Spiegel

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Keil, capital of Schleswig-Holstein, important terminal point of North and Baltic Sea Canal, waterway to Scandinavia and fine sailing spot; the Federal Republic's efforts in conjunction with international relief organisations to alleviate hunger and suffering in North Africa and Ethiopia; the space laboratory at Erno; the designer Dieter Rams and his work on form construction; and a meeting of Veteran cars at Nuremburg-ring.
